someone who believes in many gods: She is a polytheist, meaning she honours all gods and goddesses. In the ancient world everyone was a polytheist. Compare

More examplesFewer examplesThere are too many gods, even for polytheists.The polytheist wants differing gods with differing qualities to perform differing tasks.Many Jews and Muslims argue that Christians are polytheists, because the Christian Trinity represents a belief in three gods rather than one.
